title: A Chic Villa Escape in Secluded Beachfront Resort
description: Journey to Vietnam for the ultimate one-of-a-kind beachfront escape near Nha Trang. Reconnect with nature with a getaway in a huge three-storey, treehouse-style private pool villa at L'Alya Ninh Van Bay, an ultra-chic resort located on a secluded beachfront only accessible by speedboat. Enjoy decadent nightly dining experiences, delicious daily breakfast, a USD$100 credit to use on indulgent spa treatments, plus return airport and speedboat transfers.
offer_address: Quoc Lo 1A Đường tỉnh 652D, Ninh Vân, Ninh Hòa, Ninh Vân, Vietnam

title: Exclusive Six Senses Paradise in Vietnam
description: Escape to the dreamy Six Senses Ninh Van Bay resort near Nha Trang, Vietnam, an exclusive beach resort by one of the world’s most unique, premium hotel brands. Spectacularly nestled in a secluded bay where aquamarine waters meet white sands and dramatic rock formations, this award-winning destination offers luxe pool villas nestled in the hill tops, on the beach and on the rocks. Stay five nights and enjoy daily breakfast, your choice of daily two-course dinners (or lunches), a daily Six Senses experience, daily US$25 spa and experience credit, airport transfers and more.
offer_address: Ninh Vân, Ninh Hòa, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam

title: Vietnam Six Senses Private Pool Villas within Private Ninh Van Bay Peninsula
description: Experience the ultimate secluded romantic escape with Six Senses Ninh Van Bay, the five-star, multi-award-winning property located along a private cove across the bay from Nha Trang. Accessible only by speedboat, this resort was designed with privacy in mind, making it the perfect haven for honeymooners looking to start married life relaxed and rejuvenated. Villas, complete with private pools and wine cellars, are spread far and wide with secret access points, meaning you'll rarely see another soul during your stay. Use golf buggies to zip around between yoga classes, treatments at the jungle-clad spa and active sessions at the outdoor gym or tennis courts. Be wined and dined between five incredible restaurants, while a poolside bar and infinity pool are the perfect place to enjoy a sunset cocktail and a swim.
offer_address: Ninh Vân, Ninh Hòa, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam

vendor_name: An Lam Retreats Ninh Van Bay
title: Tranquil Five-Star Jungle Villa Retreat near Nha Trang with Private Beach
description:
Escape to a secluded jungle paradise, where a pristine stretch of private beach and natural stream add to an ambience of absolute tranquility at An Lam Retreats Ninh Van Bay. This all-villa sanctuary is landscaped into sloping rainforest and fronted by glittering sea views for a magical escape.

Located just a 20-minute scenic speedboat ride from Nha Trang, this secluded oasis is home to 37 luxurious timber villas decked out in eco-inspired furnishings, with most featuring a lavish private plunge pool. Spend sun-kissed days on the exclusive beachfront, transcend into a state of bliss at Jungle Spa and savour local seafood favourites amid the architectural splendour of Sen Restaurant. Afterwards, wind up the stairs to Sen Deck and bathe in bay vistas and sunset hues with a cocktail in hand. Engage with nature through a range of activities: find serenity on a hike through the stream-laced hinterland, explore the bay by kayak or learn how to catch mackerel and wrasse like a local on a unique fishing excursion.
location_description: An Lam Retreats Ninh Van Bay
offer_address: Ninh Vân, Ninh Hòa, Khanh Hoa Province, Vietnam
